name: Batrider
title: Jin'zakk
lore: There is no such thing as a fair fight. Jin'zakk, the Batrider, will tell you that while setting your tower on fire.

stickyNapalm.name: Sticky Napalm
stickyNapalm.description: Covers enemies with napalm that amplifies damage from Batrider's attacks and slows them.

flamebreak.name: Flamebreak
flamebreak.description: Hurls an explosive that knocks back enemies and deals damage over time.

firefly.name: Firefly
firefly.description: Batrider takes to the skies, flying over terrain and leaving a trail of fire that damages enemies.

flamingLasso.name: Flaming Lasso
flamingLasso.description: Lassoes an enemy and drags them behind Batrider. The victim is stunned for the duration.
